Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Marie Glarakis to change the designated beneficiary of her retirement benefits
Summary: Authorizes Marie Glarakis, a former Suffolk county police officer who is receiving a performance of duty disability retirement, to change the designated beneficiary of her retirement benefits and her retirement option to single life allowance (Option O).
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing Marie Glarakis to change the designated beneficiary of her retirement benefits
